project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement feature to fetch weather data from a public API
Process the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement feature to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
